refnamediv.refpurpose: Properties of the latex package endnotes setup

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: These properties are used to configure the endnotes package when the foonotes are printed as endnotes. Each attribute defines the content of the setup macros of the package. The user should always override the attributes of endnotes.properties and leave endnotes.properties.default untouched. See for more details.
